title: Hawaii election campaign fund; creation
context: J. Partial Public Financing [ยง11-421] Hawaii election campaign fund; creation. (a) The Hawaii election campaign fund is created as a trust fund within the state treasury. (b) The fund shall consist of: (1) All moneys collected from persons who have designated a portion of their income tax liability to the fund as provided in section 235-102.5(a); (2) Any general fund appropriations; and (3) Other moneys collected pursuant to this part. &copy; Moneys in the fund shall be paid to candidates by the comptroller as prescribed in section 11-431 and may be used for the commission&rsquo;s operating expenses, including staff salaries and fringe benefits. [L 2010, c 211, pt of ยง2]
